title: Fonts similar to these handlettered samples?
content:
I need one font that is reasonably similar to the first 4 samples below. I also need one font each similar to the other two. The first 4 are different lettering artists' takes on the same style. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1923.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120126173034/http:/typophile.com/files/1923.jpg) | 23.41 KB |
| [1929SF.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120126173034/http:/typophile.com/files/1929SF.jpg) | 14.58 KB |
| [1929trailer.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120126173034/http:/typophile.com/files/1929trailer.jpg) | 13.34 KB |
| [1930LA.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120126173034/http:/typophile.com/files/1930LA.jpg) | 13.63 KB |
| [1921caps.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120126173034/http:/typophile.com/files/1921caps.jpg) | 16.8 KB |
| [1938caps.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120126173034/http:/typophile.com/files/1938caps.jpg) | 14.34 KB |
author: BruceS63

comments.content: For 1921caps, look at something designed by Fred Goudy, like [Deepdene.](http://web.archive.org/web/20120126173034/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/lanston/ltc-deepdene/bold/)
Thanks to you both. Stephen, those last 3 are really on the mark.
